Yeah, all information that you can give me

--- David Torrey  wrote:
> Ok, I thought I sent all that in, but he was Primal
> Prime, the Maximal version of Optimus Prime, and was
> changed by a Dark force, as yet to be explained. He
> now looks like Black Battle Convoy from
> Transformers: Car Robots (TF2000). He is pure evil,
> his Spark contains no goodness at all. His plans are
> mine to keep. He has had a run in with God Magnus,
> who is his Brother, and Valtron, the Maximal version
> of Galvatron. Valtron seems to think that Dark Prime
> is the most evil thing in the universe, he seemed to
> forget about Unicron.
> 
> Why did you want to know all of this?
>
